message:
Dear {owner_name}, Amount of Rs. {amount_paid} with payment transaction id {rcpt_no} for {mod_name} with {unique_id} has been deposited successfully. You can look at the receipt on the link given below - {rcpt_link} . Thank you

EGOVS

Dear {owner_name}, Payment of Rs. {amount_paid} with payment transaction id {rcpt_no} for {mod_name} with {unique_id} has been dishonoured. Thank you

EGOVS

Dear {owner_name}, A new payment of Rs. {amount_paid} with payment transaction id {rcpt_no} for {mod_name} with {unique_id} has been made successfully. You can look at the receipt on the link given below - {rcpt_link} . Thank you

EGOVS

Dear Citizen, Your {tax_name} INR {amount_paid} for the tax period {fin_year} is paid. Your receipt no. for the transaction is {rcpt_no}. Click on the link below to download your receipt - {rcpt_link}

EGOVS
